Superior colliculus of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of superior colliculus on Waxholm mouse brain atlas, as seen in T2* weighted volume.  As seen in sagittal: At midline, superior colliculus appears significantly brighter than inferior colliculus. Off midline, difference is less pronounced but still evident. At midline, caudal to pineal gland;  rostrally, bounded by cerebral cortex, ventrally by midbrain and caudally by inferior colliculus and periaqueductal grey
